attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the prime minister must stop the pub companies, from having the monopoly the goverment allowed them the monopoly to give more choice and created two bigger monsters. i.e.PUNCH TAVERNS AND ENTERPRISE INNS. Why should tenenants be made to pay top beer prices tied to them and they are not brewers.Monotered by brulines, made to pay for all legal fees insurances and all repairs, when we are paying top rents. It should be rent or tied for the beer and not both. If the prime minister would like to check more people go out of business because of greedy Pub Companys than anyone else. Its time something was done please stop it now.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
